quotes.message: Better to ask twice than to lose your way.
quotes.name: Danish

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses: a small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Buying on credit is robbing next year's crop.
quotes.name: African American

quotes.message: By going and coming, a bird weaves its nest.
quotes.name: Ashanti

quotes.message: Do not squander time for that is the stuff that life is made of.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Dogs bark but the caravan moves on.
quotes.name: Arab Proverb

quotes.message: Don't burn your bridges behind you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Don't look where you fell but where you slipped.
quotes.name: Liberian

quotes.message: Don't plant a seed in the sea.
quotes.name: Swahili

quotes.message: Don't put all your eggs in one basket.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: Don't throw the baby out with the bath water.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don't wish your life away.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Easy come, easy go.
quotes.name: Chaucer

quotes.message: Even in Mecca, people make money.
quotes.name: Hausa

quotes.message: Every dog is allowed one bite.
quotes.name: V.S. Lean

quotes.message: First food, then religion.
quotes.name: Afghan

quotes.message: First things first.
quotes.name: G. Jackson

quotes.message: Gather the breadfruit from the farthest branches first.
quotes.name: Samoan

quotes.message: He that pays for work before it's done, has but a pennyworth for two pence.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: He who hesitates is lost.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: If you don't have a plan for yourself, you'll be part of someone else's.
quotes.name: American

quotes.message: Light gains make heavy purses.
quotes.name: George Chapman

quotes.message: Many hands make light work.
quotes.name: John Heywood

quotes.message: Necessity is the mother of invention.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: One generation plants the trees, another gets the shade.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: One should learn to sail in all waters.
quotes.name: Italian

quotes.message: One today is worth two tomorrows.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Pick your battles.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Take care of the minutes and the hours will take care of themselves.
quotes.name: Phillip Dormer Stanhope

quotes.message: The mouse that hath but one hole is taken quickly.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Waste not, want not.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Watch the pennies and the dollars will take care of themselves.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you see clouds gathering, prepare to catch rainwater.
quotes.name: African proverb Gola Tribe
